Method

If the you have seeds, or bark please grind the above amounts with a mortar and pestle to create a powder. Or blitz in a manual/ electric spice mill/ grinder. Combine the ingredients and use or store in a lidded spice jar.

You can multiply the quanitities to increase the amount to be stored. The above quanitity would be for one serving.
